source.query:
SELECT 
		E.ORG_ID                        ,
	E.NAME                          ,
	E.ADDRESS_TYPE                  ,
	CASE WHEN E.STREET  IS NOT NULL THEN E.STREET ELSE '' END AS STREET  ,
	CASE WHEN E.STREET_NUMBER  IS NOT NULL THEN E.STREET_NUMBER ELSE '' END AS STREET_NUMBER ,
	CASE WHEN E.POSTAL_CODE  IS NOT NULL THEN E.POSTAL_CODE ELSE '' END AS POSTAL_CODE                 ,
	CASE WHEN E.CITY IS NOT NULL THEN E.CITY ELSE '' END AS CITY                         ,
	CASE WHEN E.COUNTRY_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN E.COUNTRY_CODE ELSE '' END AS COUNTRY_CODE                 ,
	E.REFERENCE_DATE                ,
	E.VEHICLE_DEFAULT_OPT_IN        ,
	E.DRIVER_DEFAULT_OPT_IN         ,
	E.STATE                
	
FROM staging.Organization_CHG E
WHERE  E.CHG_FLG = 'I' 
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MASTER.ORGANIZATION L
             WHERE    L.ORG_ID = E.ORG_ID)
ORDER BY 
    	ORG_ID;
